meanings.definition: Relating to the stapes bone in the middle ear.
meanings.sent1: The stapedial bone helps transmit sound vibrations in the ear.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the stapedial bone to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The stapedial bone decided to take a break from all the noise.
meanings.sent4: Her focus was as sharp as a stapedial bone, picking up every sound around her.
meanings.sent5: The delicate stapedial bone is crucial for hearing clearly.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the stapedius muscle.
meanings.sent1: The stapedial muscle helps control the movement of the stapes bone.
meanings.sent2: During the test, the doctor observed the stapedial muscle for any signs of weakness.
meanings.sent3: The stapedial muscle won the award for the most flexible muscle in the body.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as a stapedial muscle, never giving up.
meanings.sent5: The stapedial muscle contracts to protect the delicate structures in the ear.

meanings.sent1: The stapedial artery supplies blood to the structures in the middle ear.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon carefully avoided the stapedial artery during the procedure.
meanings.sent3: The stapedial artery decided to take a scenic route through the ear.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness flowed through her like a stapedial artery, reaching everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The stapedial artery ensures proper blood flow to maintain ear health.
